zh.title: 以太坊/美元技术分析：[震荡整理中，短期缺乏明确趋势]
zh.content:
当前以太坊/美元（ETH/USD）价格维持在1971.21美元附近，短期内呈现震荡整理的走势。价格未能突破前期高点1986.48美元和低点1961.14美元，表明市场情绪较为谨慎，缺乏强烈的买卖信号。由于没有显著的趋势，投资者需警惕价格可能在这些区间内波动。

技术指标方面，MACD值为-16.60，尚处于负值区间，显示卖压仍较重，虽然信号线缺失，未能进一步确认趋势方向。SMA(20)均线处于1908.67美元，作为短期的支撑位。当前RSI(14)未提供数据，因此对市场超买或超卖情况的判断受到一定限制。

从支撑位来看，1961.14美元为近期低点，若跌破该位置，则可能会进一步探底。而上方1986.48美元是短期内的重要阻力，突破该阻力后，有可能恢复上涨动能。市场情绪仍受多方因素影响，投资者应关注价格在这些关键点位的表现。

建议投资者在此阶段采取观望策略，避免在震荡区间内进行激进操作。若价格突破1961.14美元下行或1986.48美元上行，可考虑相应的进场策略。

en.title: Ethereum vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Ethereum is currently trading at $1971.21, experiencing a modest decline of 0.38% in the past 24 hours. The price has oscillated between a high of $1986.48 and a low of $1961.14, indicating relatively low volatility. The price is near the upper bound of its recent range, suggesting a slight bearish tendency in the short term. A breakout above $1986.48 could signal bullish momentum, but if it continues to struggle below this level, a correction to the lower end of the range near $1961.14 is likely.

The absence of the Relative Strength Index (RSI) and the lack of a clear signal line for the Moving Average Convergence Divergence (MACD) leave the momentum indicators inconclusive. The MACD value of -16.60 suggests slight negative pressure, yet without a signal line, it is difficult to gauge the strength of the trend. Traders should remain cautious about entering long positions until there is a confirmation of bullish momentum or a clearer trend shift. On the other hand, short-term traders may consider taking advantage of the current price range for potential small swings.

The Simple Moving Average (SMA) of 20 periods sits at $1908.67, serving as a key support level. Should Ethereum fail to maintain support above $1961.14, it may test the SMA, which offers a stronger level of support near $1900. A breach below this level could lead to further downside risk, possibly targeting $1850. On the upside, resistance at $1986.48 remains critical for any potential breakout, with a break above this level suggesting a move toward $2000 or higher.

For short-term traders, an ideal strategy would involve waiting for either a clear breakout above $1986.48 or a retest of the SMA near $1908.67 to buy at lower levels. Given the current market sentiment, a range-bound trading strategy could be effective in the immediate term, provided adequate risk management is applied.
